title: Chain-structured neural architecture search for financial time series forecasting
abstract: arXiv:2403.14695v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: We compare three popular neural architecture search strategies on chain-structured search spaces: Bayesian optimization, the hyperband method, and reinforcement learning in the context of financial time series forecasting.
context:
Title: Chain-structured neural architecture search for financial time series forecasting
Abstract: arXiv:2403.14695v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: We compare three popular neural architecture search strategies on chain-structured search spaces: Bayesian optimization, the hyperband method, and reinforcement learning in the context of financial time series forecasting.
translated_title: 针对金融时间序列预测的链式神经架构搜索
translated_abstract: 我们在链式搜索空间上比较了三种流行的神经架构搜索策略：贝叶斯优化、超带方法和强化学习，这在金融时间序列预测的背景下进行了研究。
tldr: 在金融时间序列预测领域，比较了贝叶斯优化、超带方法和强化学习等神经架构搜索策略。
en_tdlr: Compared three popular neural architecture search strategies - Bayesian optimization, the hyperband method, and reinforcement learning in the context of financial time series forecasting.
